text: Niscaya ichalame'i allahara ocarata ekamatra dbina; arau yisakalaka kitaba pradana karaa haichila sihamte keralamatra paraspara bidbesabasatah sihamtara ocarata jnana ahara pichato matanaikya karaichila. Arau yiye allahara ayatasamuhara lagata kupharai karaiba tente niscaya allaha drauta hicapa grahanakarai
